conversation.speaker: Mimi
conversation.text: ?!! So you are the Old One... just how long have you been sealed here?

conversation.speaker: Mimi
conversation.text: Argh! What are you doing? Don't feel bad for it now!

conversation.speaker: Mimi
conversation.text: ...sorry Old One, it's nothing personal. The only thing standing between me and becoming recognized by my peers is you.

conversation.speaker: Mimi
conversation.text: uuu... uu... T-that's right! I don't fear you! Mimi the Magical Battlecat knows no fear

conversation.speaker: Mimi
conversation.text: After this, they'll call me Mimi, the Defender of Tomorrow! IN THE NAME OF THE FAE, I WILL PUT AN END TO YOU!
